audioText: Voire quotidiennement, mon frère montes au grenier chercher des exemples pour ses devoirs.
question: Voire quotidiennement, mon frère montes au grenier chercher des exemples pour ses devoirs.
options: Even daily, to look for examples for his homework
Only on weekends when he has free time available
Twice a week during his study sessions
Once a month to organize his school materials
explanation: The text states 'Voire quotidiennement, mon frère monte au grenier chercher des exemples pour ses devoirs' - Even daily, my brother goes up to the attic to look for examples for his homework. This combines 'voire', 'quotidiennement', 'montes', and 'exemples'. The distractors test confusion about the frequency.
source: Strategic targeting - voire + quotidiennement + montes + exemples synergy + study habits
